item.title: Code Formatting Conventions
item.description: Code Formatting Conventions Common Sense Just use it, it may be better to break the convention rules in some cases. Indentation Tabs, at four columns. Always indent within braces. Remember to change your text editor/IDE configuration, so it automatically uses tabs instead of spaces. Braces Braces in your code should look like the following example: for (int i = 0; i < t; i++) { [...] } if (j < k) { [.
